choices: Penelope Pussycat (The cat Pepe Le Pew chases)
1.content:
Welcome and Let us begin by choosing a woman

Who will you choose?

The truth is it doesn't really matter to me.

Feel free to choose for yourself.
1.title: Introduction

11.content:
As most of us on the internet know there are too distinct versions of Lola Bunny.

1:The first and the Fan Favorite Space Jam version.

2: The, "Revised" version that appears on the Newest Loony Toons show. The one that has been angering many fan boys since 2010.

It is now up to you to choose which one to make fat.

Guidelines to pros and cons: Cons: The Space Jam version is more difficult to make fat without altering her personality somewhat, Pros: but it's well worth it if your writing talent is good enough and you will receive lots of praise for talent and determination to make it work.

Pros: The Loony Toons Show version is easier to make fat due to dim wittedness (provided it be convincing enough) Cons: Unfortunately because she is the less popular of the 2 you may have to work extra hard to prevent any sort of backlash.

So... what's it gonna be?

Oops almost forgot, I will not allow "cop-outs" like, "she just got hungry" or she did it for no reason. The True Fan Fiction writer works with the characters personalities to the best possible degree. Not worps them to suit their purpose.
11.title: Lola Bunny

111.content:
In my opinion this is the better of the 2 versions. I hope you feel the same way.

Now I know this next part isn't gonna make any sense but just bear with me on this one, this chapter begins a storyline that takes place in an alternate reality where the events of Space Jam never happened.

I know that this Lola is the Space Jam version so why would I do this?

Because looking back on it now I realize that the movie was an awful attempt at advertising, and that Lola Bunny was the only good thing to come out of it (aside from 2 soft songs in the soundtrack.)

So please understand that everything else about the Loony Toons is the same as before. Lola still exists and she still has the same personality, she still plays basketball (until we make her too fat for it right? HA!), she did before she was remade into that show (go to the other version chapter for that one this isn't about her) and she and Bugs Bunny will still get to meet (or not depending on your choices).

Anyway time to pick a setting/motivation for the beginning of her Weight Gain story.

Basketball Court = Lola is an amateur player who often plays by herself and gets lonely.

Gym = She regularly works out at the gym in an attempt to stay skinny and so that some non-existent hunk will notice her when she makes a life-changing discovery.

Café = On a day she takes off from playing Basketball, she becomes hooked on a certain food. Addiction vs. Who will win?
111.title: The Space Jam Version

112.content:
Okay, having been a huge Looney Toons show fan for a while now, I'm glad to undertake this challenge. I honestlty don't understand how THIS Lola is less popular. The biggest gripe with the original character, to my understanding at least, was that she wasn't funny and way too serious. The current incarnation fixes that so what's the problem now?

That being said, here's my take on the WG scenario. It's based on canon events but feel free to change things. The first idea comes from an episode where Porky Pig, working as a caterer, improves business by dipping into his grandma's old recipes. Bugs becomes utterly addicted to delicious but unheathy treats like Butter Pie and Butter and Molasses Fritter, leading to him becoming quite huge. Shall we put Lola through a similar ordeal or something else?
112.title: The Loony Toons Show Version

choices: "Sure Bun-bun! It'd be a game to let good food go to waste!"
"I'm not sure... I have been trying to cut back recently..."
1121.content:
"Oh d-dear. W-what should I do?" Porky stammered, frantically pacing across the wooden floor of Bugs' house. Bugs sighed and rolled his eyes; Porky was blowing the situation out of proportion again. Porky had received a large catering order for a party at some place or other in town. The problem was, said party had been cancelled due to a sudden change in the weather, which happened only after Porky had prepared all of his baked goods. The food he made was fresh, and were only in the best condition during the first few days of their creation. "Porky, just get someone else to buy 'em, and your problem's solved."
"B-b-but who would want to buy so much food on such short notice?"
Just then Lola walked in causing Bugs to sigh in relief. Lola could be easily swayed, so he should have no problem convincing her to buy Porky's goods. He did feel slightly guilty for the way he was using her, however she was rich, and Porky could easily get annoying, so he didn't dwell upon the feeling for too long.
"Ooh something smells nice!"
"Oh, Lola," Bugs said, "Porky made a truck-load of food, but no-one's buying it. Perhaps you might be interested...?"

Lola tilted her head slightly, and pondered the suggestion for a moment before saying...
1121.title: Porky's Catering

choices: Sweet foods (e.g. Cakes, cookies, biscuits, etc.)
Savoury Foods (e.g. Sausage rolls, cheese straws, vol-au-vons, etc.)
11211.content:
Lola looked out of the window for the hundreth time in the last few hours. She sighed; the food still hasn't arrived. Her stomach started to growl, making her cheeks turn pink. She really hoped that food would arrive soon.

Ten minutes later the food arrived. When Bugs described the amount of food as a truck-load he hadn't been exaggerating. In fact, he'd made an understatement. Three huge trucks parked up in front of her apartment, and she could see men hauling the food she had purchased into bin bags, when she heard a knock on the door. She gave a squeal of excitement and ran to the door. When she opened it, she found a man stood there with a hard hat on his head and a clipboard in his hand.
"Are you Miss... Lola Bunny?" The man inquired, looking at her with a hint of confusion in his eyes. It isn't everyday you see a walking, talking rabbit, and he was new to the area, so didn't know about its more... Peculiar residents.
"Yes! That's me!" She replied, bouncing up and down in anticipation.
"Ok.. Well to receive your order, sign here, here and here." He indicated to a different space on the paper each time he said the word 'here'.
She frantically signed the paper, and jumped onto her couch, waiting for the food to be loaded in.

It took several hours, but the men had finally managed to bring all of the food inside. Every room in her apartment was piled with food, and some of her furniture wasn't even visible due to the vast quantities of food piled upon it. Just then, her stomach rumbled again. If she thought that her stomach was loud before, then there were no words to describe its volume now.

She decides to feed her growling stomach, but what type of food does she start with?
11211.title: "Sure Bun-bun! It'd be a shame to let good..."

1122.content: Okay, here's another idea taken from an episode. How about Lola enters a hot dog eating contest for a cool prize like Daffy did?
1122.title: Other.

choices: She ate pills that when wet turn into all you can eat buffets
She feasted on too many sweets

1123.title: Something completely different.

121.title: Eat lot of Carrot Cakes

13.content:
Aw the skunk that made many young boys like me years later learn for love that stinks. Good Choice. But not so fast, before you have her demolish the nearest buffet she needs to have a motivation of kind to do so. Maybe even add a time period too... I got it!

In the cartoon she is still clearly a school girl right? Well how about we also mix it up a little by having her gain AFTER she graduated from ACME Looniversity as an adult? If you don't like that you can still go with the old version. Just keep in mind that her adult self might look a little something like this BEFORE we have her blimp up her waistline. http://www.furaffinity.net/view/12103314...

Key:

DS = During Show, takes place during the run of Tiny Toons.

PS = Post Show, takes place years later AFTER Tiny Toons was cancelled.

Love = What else she is a gainer and SOMEONE is her feeder.

Sorrow = She eats because she is sad at the fact that she is unable to find Dependable love due to her stench.
13.title: Fifi La Fume

choices: A way to entice her latest crush
131.content: What scenario do we put Fifi in for gaining weight during her time on Tiny Toons?
131.title: DS Love

choices: Her current crush and/or lover is a Feeder and/or FA.
132.content: And what causes post-show Fifi to pack on the pounds?
132.title: PS Love

14.content:
Penelope Pussycat http://fc04.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2011/0... a most underrated Loony Toons Girl.

Let us go over the various methods at our disposal for expanding her waistline.

Acceptance: This is exactly what it sounds like Penelope Pussycat and Pepe Le Pew http://curezone.com/upload/clipart/Pepe_... are in a loving gainer/feeder relationship. Pepe is the Feeder who fattens up the gainer Penelope.

Evasion: Another obvious one, Penelope attempts to evade Pepe's unwanted affection by getting fat.

Sorrow: No one is romantically interested in her... (yet) as she eats to cope.

Force Fed: Self explanatory, but whether she is being fed by Pepe or someone else is anyone's guess/choice.

Bizarre: Penelope's belly and or body expands in various ways due to several unconventional methods. (Reader's Choice)
14.title: Penelope Pussycat (The cat Pepe Le Pew chases)

choices: Penelope tries to get some fish.
Penelope orders some ACME powdered instant weight gain mix.
142.content:
Out in the streets of Paris, as always, Penelope the Cat is running as fast as she can to get away from a current love-struck skunk named Pepe le Pew. Now the thing is, even after learning that Penelope isn't actually a skunk, he still continues to pursue her. Which would be okay for her, if Pepe didn't smell worse than Limburger rotting in the sun for a month. Penelope was currently hiding behind a corner and doing some heavy panting. She was hoping Pepe wouldn't find her. Down the lane he was doing his usual bouncing.

"Where are you my little bon bon?" Pepe said while bouncing.

He happened to past the corner she was hiding in. So she was free for now. Penelope took a big sigh of relief. But she knew it was not gonna last. After a few minutes when the coast was clear, Penelope try to have a normal day. At that moment, her stomach growled like something furious. After all that running she was starving.

She went over to a cafe and had a big basket of french pastries.

"Ugh! I'm sick and tired of having to running way." Penelope thought while eating some of the pastries. "I have to do something so lover-boy losses interest with me. But what?" She was about to eat another croissant, but then put it down. "I better ease up on the pastries. I don't want to get fa....."

Then, Penelope had an idea.

"Wait a minute... Maybe if I lose my thin figure, he will lose interest and stop chasing me." Penelope thought.

To her, if was worth a try. Penelope decided to gain weight.
142.title: Penelope's gain.

1422.content:
“Now, if I'm going to gain weight, it might as well be eating fish” Penelope thought.

"It's only reasonable since well, I AM a cat. 'Tis but a more preferred choice among us zan pastries, no? Plus, all ze protein would help fuel ma muscles, in case he'd still want to chase moi” She giggled at her joke.

“Now, where do I find a place with lots of-" Then it clicked her. “Ah! Ze harbor!!" She rushed there excitedly to enact her thickening tactic...which also happened to begin about half a kilometer away.

By the time she reached it, she was panting heavily, exhausted from all the cardio she had endured in her ebullient marathon. Her limbs then gave way, causing her to fall flat on her belly. “I may have to *pant* cut down on ze *huff* cardio if I want to *gasp* gain some weight. *puff*" She huffed between words.

"Wait!!" She rose. “Zat means...I will have to avoid Pepé ze entire time I try to fatten myself! Oh, I’d better find a place to hide until after zen” she panicked, looking around for somewhere to settle until her plumping ploy comes into fruition.
She spots a large, decrepit building just close to the docks. “Seem like no one’s been zere for quite some time. ‘Tis ze perfect hideout!”

She heads over to the ships in search of a fishing vessel, and fortunately one just happened to dock within a few seconds. “Docking ze S.S Canard Assis!! We’ve come with our catch of ze day!!” announced the captain. One of the sailors lowered a crane carrying a net filled with schools of tuna, opening up as soon as it hit the deck. “Hooh, quite a lot are swimming about time of year, no?” he commented. “We’ve been getting quite ze haul zis month”

Penelope gaped in a mixture of awe and elation, salivating greedily as she witnessed the massive pile of fish laying before her eyes. “Come to mama, ma little tummy swimmers~” she said, ambling towards the boat. But then she realized, shaking her head and snapping out of her trance. “Wait, how am I supposed to sneak zis into ze house without getting any of ze fishermen’s attention?”

Suddenly, her brain hatched an idea. She went to the nearest payphone and ordered a package from ACME. She was worried it would take some time to reach her, but Mailbird Roadrunner had only arrived with it in a matter of minutes. He stopped behind her, though she remained unaware of his presence.

He gently placed Penny’s order beside her with his beak, after which he notified his presence with his signature call. “MEEP MEEP!!” he beeped, heavily startling Penelope in the process. “EEEEK!!” she shrieked, jumping quite a distance upwards. Fortunately she landed on her feet, being a cat.
She signed her name on the ACME contract, slightly annoyed by Roadrunner’s noisy entrance. With that, Roadrunner beeped his gratitude to her for ordering before zooming off.

Unsheathing her claws, she tore open the package with joyous vigor, revealing it to be a bottle of Invisibility Perfume. She sprayed herself with it, snickering in glee as she did so. Sneaking aboard, she picked up as much fish as she could carry, making them invisible as well by rubbing them against the perfume droplets on her fur.

She rushed to her hideout, the perfume wearing out just as she reached its vicinity. She found a small hopper vent at the side of the house. “I may need some assistance fitting through zis in a couple weeks” she remarked to the viewers, giggling at her witty jest. She slipped inwards through the vent, landing on a front-load washing machine directly below it. She found herself in an empty laundry room which, while not completely filthy, was still shrouded by a lingering stench. “PEW!! I might as well use some of zis stuff in here”. She sprayed the room with her perfume...removing most of the walls in the process. “At least it smells nicer now, no?” she said, somewhat embarrassed.

She hopped off the washing machine, ready to enjoy her quick-spoiling spoils but before she did so, she realized something. “Oh, I may need something to wash zis down”. She went outside and used a payphone, ordering some milk to compliment her fish, as well as to aid in her plan to lose Pepé once and for all, due to its notable fat content. Milkbird Roadrunner rushed in with her order, scaring her once again with his blaring beeps. “EEEEK!! WOULD YOU CUT ZAT OUT!!?” she rebuked. Roadrunner only stared, still displaying his mysteriously consistent grin, juxtaposing Penny’s incandescent expression. After a moment of silence, he pulled out another contract, which Penny signed, more irritated than last time. Once again, he beeped his gratitude and belted off. “Hmph, and people say my kind are rude.” she said, already growing sick of Roadrunner’s inconsiderate appearances.

She gently carried the bottles through the vent, careful not to shatter them. “And now, ‘tis time to feast. Bon appétit.” she said proceeding to stuff herself with fish and milk. She ate like a queen, savoring every bite and enjoying every gulp. By the time she was finished, her provisions were picked clean, surrounding her with empty bottles and fish skeletons.

Penelope lied supinely in the middle of the room, sighing in satisfaction with her recent bout of gluttony. She looked down and poked at her distended stomach. “Zis may be food now, but as I carry on with ma gluttonous scheme, it’ll turn into fat, and continue to build up in my system until ma thin, graceful figure becomes so plump and juicy, zat Le Pew will be far too disgusted by it to ever chase moi again. Ohohohoho, Penelope you genius, you’ve finally found a way to rid your life of zat troublesome skunk once and for all!” she said to herself, proudly reminiscing the successful unfolding of her master plan. “Yawwwwwn, all zat stuffing has made me quite fatiguée. I had better get some rest.” she said, falling asleep soon after.

The passing weeks were spent routinely, with Penelope using bottles of Invisibility Perfume to smuggle the S.S Canard Assis’s daily catches into her ramshackle refuge, guzzling them down with milk, and dozing til they digest. She eventually began to gain some weight during her heists, slowing her down gradually, which she compensated for by using up more perfume to stay invisible longer. As every few days passed, her figure started to plump. Her limbs grew thicker, her face became chubbier, and her tummy got softer. And her wiggles through the vent got tighter.

The sun rose over the horizon as the last day of the month arrived. A small ray of sunlight shone through the small hopper vent and onto a mound of fish bones. Awakened, Penelope arose from it, yawning and stretching. She smacked her lips and began to scratch her stomach, only for her claws to sink in much deeper than they usually do. “Hmm!?” she said, looking down intrigued. Her previously slender tummy has now grown significantly rounder and flabbier. She jumped to her feet, causing it to jiggle a bit. “Oh!” she cried, startled by the movement.

Her belly bulges out so far it manages to obstruct her feet. When she leaned over to see them, she noticed her previously svelte legs now look like she was being supported by a pair of plump, charred sausages, with no hint of a thigh gap between them.
She then moved onto her arms, which have also grown quite pudgy. She pinched her upper arm, squeezing a relatively considerable amount of flesh from it. “My limbs, they’ve gotten so...plump” she said.
She lowered her gaze back to her belly, drooping down like a giant marshmallow was melting from her torso. She groped it, feeling it’s flesh bulge between her chubby fingers. She felt her sides, squeezing her newly formed love handles. “And ma waist. It has become so round and squishy. It...fills my hands trying to grab it!”.
She moved her hands toward her face. “Even ma cheeks have plumped up” she said, grabbing her chubby cheeks. And finally, she moved a finger down to her chin, finding it encompassed by a soft, thick layer of excess fat. “I’ve grown a...double chin”.
She’d finally done it, weeks of excessive feeding and sleeping between meals have considerably softened her body.
“Look at moi, I’m so...so fat” she said, mesmerized by her new, hefty figure. She found it hard to believe she’d ever get this fat in her life.

Realizing her plan’s final stage can finally commence, her eyes narrowed and ears lowered behind her head as a malicious grin slowly spread across her face. A low, deep, vengeful laugh escaped her lips. “Prepare to be repulsed by ma plumpness, Pepé Le Pew” she said, rubbing her paws together. Abandoning her shelter, she jumped off the washing machine and through the vent, only to get stuck. She struggled to escape, but was far too chubby to budge. “...well, I wasn’t wrong.” she said to the viewers, alluding to her statement earlier that month. Luckily, she saw Mailbird Roadrunner zipping towards her path in the distance and called for help. Rushing over, he grabbed her paw with his beak and tugged as hard as he could. She managed to squeeze free and got up to dust herself. “Merci, monsieur oiseau” she said, grateful for him despite his previously annoying behavior towards her. She then asked for a ride to Pepé’s perfumerie, to which he complied and carried her there on back.

Upon reaching her destination, she hopped off and waved Roadrunner goodbye. Striding confidently to the entrance, she knocked the door, followed by Pepé opening it. “M-M-MADAME!!?” he squawked, shocked by her new appearance “IS...IS ZAT REALLY YOU!!?” She smirked, ready to strike. “Why, yes it is~” she said seductively, despite her opposing intentions. “Have you noticed how...soft I’ve become over ze month~?” she said, patting her tummy. “Oh I couldn’t help myself, I’ve been indulging in lots of savory, delicious food. And look at what zat’s turned me into: a big, fat, marshmallow of a kitty~” she giggled, jiggling her belly. “Are you willing to accept moi after zis, Pepé Le Pew?”

Pepé stood there, addled by her question.
1422.title: Fishin’ for Squish

1522.content:
Just to give more choices in stories here’s some story options to pick from:

Option 1: Daffy and his crazy antics are not the easiest person to get along with, expressly for his Girlfriend. So it’s not surprising that Tina can get stressed out by Daffy and needs a way to cool off, in this case the answer to her needs is chocolate and a lot of other snacks too, of course, knowing Daffy is always stressful so those snacks soon start to add up

Option 2: Things have been looking good for Tina, and so to celebrate she decides to throw a big meal/party with Porky’s fattening recipes from his catering service making up most of the food, leading to Tina packing on the pounds

154.title: Rhubella Rat

info.brief_description: The Anthro women of loony Toons franchise start eating for love,laughs,and for pleasure.
info.description:
We've all seen someone we like from Loony Toons Expand and get fat once in a while, Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, and others. But never the women, (sure there would be a fat one every once in a great while but we've never seen one of the iconic characters ever go from skinny to fat, at least not yet,) But now is your chance to give the girls/women their fair chance at expansion. At your leisure, Just be sure to follow the very few basic rules.

1: Only the anthropomorphic (talking animals) are to be the ones who pack on the pounds (Characters Like Elmyra, and Granny, are off limits, because nobody really wants to see that.) But I digress it's ok to put them in as mentioned or have them play bit parts. They just can't be the main focus.

2: Because the Rating of this item is 13+ your not allowed to make the characters have sex, or mention any of their private parts by name (even though on chars like Bugs Bunny they cannot be seen even when they ARE naked, CARTOON LOGIC AHO!!) But it is ok to make them kiss mouth to mouth because let's face it's already been done plenty of times in the cartoons... if you know what I'm talking about... right?

3: As much as I support gay rights I'm afraid I can't allow homosexual couples here in this story, no offense please don't sue me it's just that strait couples give a WIDER sense of variety, that is all.

I hope that covers everything. And here is a link to a very long List of all Loony Toons Characters published by The Warner brother's company. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Looney_Tunes_and_Merrie_Melodies_characters...

Oops. I almost Forgot to mention It's Ok to include characters from Tiny Toons Adventures and Loonatics Unleashed, because variety. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Tiny_Toon_Adventures_characters http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Loonatics_Unleashed_characters
